label: 迎講
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Welcome Lectures consisted of sermons and symbolic representations based on the nineteenth of Amitābha's Forty-eight Vows to save sentient beings and create an ideal paradise, in which he promises to come with his attendants to fetch true believers to the Pure Land (p. 513n).
